verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: he will meet with Korean President Kim Jong Un on June 12th in Singapore] .
President Donald Trump says he [V: will] meet with Korean President Kim Jong Un on June 12th in Singapore .
President Donald Trump says [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARG1: with Korean President Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-TMP: on June 12th] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] .
